description: The index is designed to track the performance of U.S.-listed securities, including ADRs, of companies which are involved in infrastructure through engineering, design, maintenance, and construction of infrastructure projects. The fund invests at least 80% of its net assets in financial instruments, such as swap agreements, securities of the index, and ETFs that track the index and other financial instruments that provide daily leveraged exposure to the index or to ETFs that track the index. It is non-diversified.
name: Direxion Daily US Infrastructure Bull 2X Shares
